ngbto_options_desc: Mod for keeping the game playable
ngbto_one_down_loud_desc: Minimum amount of hours for Death Sentence difficulty with loud tag or no tag
ngbto_one_down_stealth_desc: Minimum amount of hours for Death Sentence difficulty with stealth tag
ngbto_mayhem_loud_desc: Minimum amount of hours for Mayhem difficulty with loud tag or no tag
ngbto_mayhem_stealth_desc: Minimum amount of hours for Mayhem difficulty with stealth tag
ngbto_empty_perk_deck_desc: Kick players with perk deck completion 0/9
ngbto_show_skills_desc: Print information about people skills and perk decks as they join the game
ngbto_deathwish_loud_desc: Minimum amount of hours for deathwish difficulty with loud tag or no tag
ngbto_deathwish_stealth_desc: Minimum amount of hours for deathwish difficulty with stealth tag
ngbto_overkill_loud_desc: Minimum amount of hours for overkill difficulty with loud tag or no tag
ngbto_overkill_stealth_desc: Minimum amount of hours for overkill difficulty with stealth tag
ngbto_perk_deck_1_desc: Kick players that use Crew chief perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_2_desc: Kick players that use Muscle perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_3_desc: Kick players that use Armorer perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_4_desc: Kick players that use Rogue perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_5_desc: Kick players that use Hitman perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_6_desc: Kick players that use Crook perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_7_desc: Kick players that use Burglar perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_8_desc: Kick players that use Infiltrator perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_9_desc: Kick players that use Sociopath perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_10_desc: Kick players that use Gambler perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_11_desc: Kick players that use Grinder perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_12_desc: Kick players that use Yakuza perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_13_desc: Kick players that use Ex-President perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_14_desc: Kick players that use Maniac perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_15_desc: Kick players that use Anarchist perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_16_desc: Kick players that use Biker perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_17_desc: Kick players that use Kingpin perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_18_desc: Kick players that use Sicario perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_19_desc: Kick players that use Stoic perk decks
ngbto_perk_deck_20_desc: Kick players that use Tag Team perk decks
ngbto_hidden_infamy_desc:
Kick hidden/private profiles according to their infamy level
(Requires: Kick Hidden profiles)
ngbto_hidden_infamy_minimum_desc:
Minimum infamy level for hidden profiles
(Requires: Kick Hidden profiles and Hidden infamy)
lobby_create_message_4: hours total playtime from the game.
player_was_hidden: kicked for having a hidden profile
cheater_ban: was banned for using too many skill points
perk_deck_kick_4: kicked for private profile and too low infamy level
perk_deck_kick_5: kicked for private profile and too high infamy level
ngbto_local_message_desc:
Select either the messages will be the same language as your game or in english
(Others might not understand your language)
ngbto_no_deployable_desc:
Will kick people with no deployables from the game
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_single_turret_desc:
Will kick people with turret deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_body_bags_desc:
Will kick people with body bags deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_kit_desc:
Will kick people with armor bag deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_single_ecm_desc:
Will kick people with ecm jammer deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_four_first_aid_kits_desc:
Will kick people with 4 first aid kit deployables
(Only works if the game has already started)
ngbto_pd2stats_desc:
Use pd2stats anti-cheat to ban cheaters
(Might result in few false positives)
ngbto_hidden_infamy_v_desc:
Kick hidden profiles that have V-100 infamy
(Requires to use: Kick Hidden profiles and Hidden infamy)
ngbto_hidden_infamy_xxv_desc:
Kick hidden profiles that have XXV-100 infamy
(Requires to use: Kick Hidden profiles and Hidden infamy)
ngbto_incomplete_perk_deck_desc: Kick people that have incomplete perk deck Exmpl: Hitman 8/9
incomplete_perk_deck_kick: kicked for having incomplete perk deck
ngbto_armor_1_desc:
Kick people with two piece suit
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_2_desc:
Kick people with light ballistic vest
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_3_desc:
Kick people with ballistic vest
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_4_desc:
Kick people with heavy ballistic vest
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_5_desc:
Kick people with flack jacket
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_6_desc:
Kick people with combined tactical vest
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_armor_7_desc:
Kick people with improved combined tactical vest
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_hidden_infamy_maximum_desc:
Maximum infamy level for hidden profiles
(Requires: Kick Hidden profiles and Hidden infamy)
ngbto_pd2stats_extra_desc:
Ban people with 'Not enough heists completed to reach infamy whatever' 
I have made this, because this setting has a lot of false positives
deathwish_count_kick: has completed too few heists on deathwish
ngbto_deathwish_heists_desc: Kick people with less than desired number of deathwish games completed
ngbto_total_heists_desc: Kick people with less than desired number of games completed
lobby_not_supported: This lobby will print information about joining people and ban cheaters automatically
ngbto_language_desc:
Select language in which the information will be presented to you
(Requires restart to take affect)
ngbto_toggle_desc: With this keybind you can select to turn on or off the modification at any time
ngbto_statistics_desc:
Print statistics of all the players after the end of the heist
(only for the host)
ngbto_skill_overlay_desc: When pressed it will display everyones information in a quick overlay and it will disappear in 5 seconds
ngbto_ingame_anticheat_desc: Ban people that are tagged by the ingame anti-cheat
ngbto_manual_ban_desc: Select people from the current playlist to add them to the blacklist
Manual_ban_select: Select a person to add to the blacklist
ngbto_inspection_desc: Display various infomation about the selected player
ngbto_detailed_skills_desc:
Show detailed skill points 
 Example: FishTaco |10:30:40:0:15| or FishTaco M (10:30:40) E(0:15:0) T(0:15:0) G(0:15:0) F(0:15:0)|
ngbto_options_anti_cheat_desc: Functions related to anti cheat, this will make your lobby more secure against those who like to take the easy way out
ngbto_options_data_filters_desc: Filter people by selected amount of playtime or amount of played heists
ngbto_options_extras_desc: Select what information to display to you and the other players
ngbto_skill_cheats_desc: Ban people that have more than 120 skill points
ngbto_kick_type_desc: If it is ticked, then it will kick people instantly else it will give them a brief window to read the kick message before being kicked out
ngbto_remove_type_desc:
Which way to remove the person from the game, what to show the person
Hide kick: will show them disconnected message and wont let to rejoin
Show kick: Will kick them and won't let to rejoin
Disconnect: Will only disconnect the person, letting him to rejoin
ngbto_options_infamy_desc: Filter people that have gained something faster than you think is possible
ngbto_infamy_hours_desc:
Minimum hour count to achieve this level of infamy
(Requires: Infamy by hours)
ngbto_infamy_check_desc: When selected you will be able to use the filters down bellow
ngbto_achievements_check_desc: Filter people that have more than 370 achievements and less than 300 hours
ngbto_detection_loud_desc:
Filter people by detection rate
(Only works if the game has tag of Loud)
ngbto_detection_loud_value_desc:
It will kick everyone that has lower than this detection rate, only works if the game has already started
(Requires: Detection Loud)
ngbto_detection_stealth_desc:
Filter people by detection rate
(Only works if the game has tag of Stealth)
ngbto_detection_stealth_value_desc:
It will kick everyone that has bigger than this detection rate, only works if the game has already started
(Requires: Detection Stealth)
ngbto_detection_too_high: kicked for having too high detection rate
ngbto_detection_too_low: kicked for having too low detection rate
ngbto_first_aid_kit_desc:
Will kick people with first aid kit deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_trip_mine_desc:
Will kick people with trip mine deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_doctor_bag_desc:
Will kick people with medic bag deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
ngbto_ammo_bag_desc:
Will kick people with ammo bag deployables
(Only works if the game has started or in loadout screen)
